study.name: Male Mouse blood
study.description: Investigating male mouse blood from healthy specimens. Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Vicky Horst. Journal of Nonexistent Mock Studies. Volume 1, p1, February 2020. Adding mock study data to development and staging environments has been shown to improve testability of new code. We extend those findings to the Single Cell Portal by adding this mock data.
